subject: Fencing (Sport)
Olympic Games (2012)
lead_paragraph: The United States won one Olympic medal in fencing between 1964 and 2004, but is now considered one of the teams to be reckoned with in all disciplines at the London Games.
snippet: The United States won one Olympic medal in fencing between 1964 and 2004, but is now considered one of the teams to be reckoned with in all disciplines at the London Games.
